content:
Maathaavin-smrthi naa-naa deshatthum
Valuthaakki-theerttho-nettam sthothram.
Nirmmalayaam-kanye! Jananee ninte
Vaangippin-perunnaall-ghoshichoril
Naathhasutha-nmaarthan-kshemam sathatham
Vaaneedaan-naathhe!-praarththhichaalum.
Vaanidamee-naallil-paavanamaayi
Than mrthiyaalulakam-vaazhtthappettu.
Kandaalum-vimale nin verpaadil
Iha paralo-kangall-modikkunnu.
Shleehanmaa-rellaam-inne divasam
Dikkukallil ninnum-chelodetthi
Jeevippo-roppam-mrtharum bhakthyaa
Anuyaanam cheythaar bhaagyonnathaye.
